[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":["React 从最初由 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/jordwalke","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Jordan Walke"}]," 创立至今, 已拥有 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/community/team","children":"专门的团队在全职从事这项工作"}],", 同时社区拥有超过 1k+ 的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/react/blob/main/AUTHORS","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"开源贡献者"}]," 参与。"]}]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["我们要特别感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/tomocchino","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Tom Occhino"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/wolffiex","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Adam Wolff"}],"，感谢他们多年来的指导和支持。我们还要感谢所有 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://translations.reactjs.org/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"将 React 翻译为其他语言的志愿者们"}],"。"]}],"
